TopicTitle: Long time lurker, first time poster.

Articles.Content: Howdy, folks! I've been playing KSP since I stumbled on it last July, and am generally hooked. I thoroughly enjoy the challenges this game gives out, and am super stoked for interplanetary missions. Currently practicing my orbital rendezvous and EVA crew transfers to prepare for those.
Howdy right back! And welcome to the forums.
